name: Thundergun
description:
Español 🇪🇸

Eres el cabo Maxmustacho a.k.a. "Thundergun", un renegado, un temerario, una maquina de justicia lista para hacer todo en aras de la libertad. Acompañado de su descapotable y una dosis diaria de plomo, encierra a los criminales mas perversos de la ciudad.

Controles

  • WASD: Mover
  • Mouse Click: Disparar
  • R: Recargar
  • Espacio: Volver a jugar

Acercate a tus enemigos y eliminalos.

English 🇺🇸

You are the rookie Maxmustacho a.k.a. "Thundergun", a renegade, a reckless, a justice machine ready to do everything for the sake of freedom. Accompanied by a convertible and a daily dose of lead, it locks up the most evil criminals in the city.

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse Click: Shoot
  • R: Reload
  • Espacio: Restart

Creditos

  • Programacion: Leonardo Añez Vladimirovna
  • Arte: Martha Añez Vladimirovna

Musica: 

  • Switch Me On by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
  • OST Audio - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hvehBk_IgZ0

SFX:

  • http://www.themotionmonkey.co.uk/free-resources/retro-arcade-sounds/
